Back trace result using gdb

#0  0x00007ffff782dc37 in __GI_raise (sig=sig@entry=6) at ../nptl/sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c:56

#3  0x00007ffff787655e in malloc_printerr (ptr=<optimized out>, str=0x7ffff7974801 "free(): invalid pointer", action=1) at malloc.c:4996

    stack_end=0x7fffffffddd8) at libc-start.c:287

```
